articles.title: Here's what to know about Nigeria's presidential election - CNN
articles.description: Nigerians prepare to head to the polls in what will be the largest democratic exercise on the continent as Africa's most populous nation picks a new president. CNN's Stephanie Busari reports.

articles.title: Banana paper shell boosts yam size and yield - Futurity: Research News
articles.description: Wrapping yam seeds in banana paper resulted in larger yams and higher crop yields, a new study in Africa shows.
articles.content:
Wrapping yam seeds in biodegradable paper made from a mixture of unusable parts of banana plants and recycled cardboard boxes sharply increases yam size and yields, researchers say.
